text: Drasteria sesquilina is a moth of the family Erebidae. It is found in Turkey, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan and Tajikistan.Naturkundliches Informationssystem ==References== Category:Drasteria Category:Moths described in 1888 Category:Moths of Asia Category:Moths of Turkey Category:Taxa named by Otto Staudinger
title: Drasteria sesquilina
